original_title: 生つば美人妻 妄想で寝取られて
overview: Tomoya Maruishi , a screenwriter who suffers from slump. He mainly writes pink movies, but his idea of ​​a wet place comes to mind when he has sex with his wife, but when it comes to writing, he can't write. When it is pointed out that his erection is getting worse even in the actual sex life, Tomoya gets impatient both physically and mentally.  When Tomoya consulted with Sekikawa , a senior screenwriter, he explained that his wife Tomoko was satisfied with everything, and he dared to avoid Tomoko . Start. The plan is to run the brush with Tomoya's delusion and jealousy.
title: Raw Brim Beautiful Wife: Cuckold in Delusion
